text: A transcontinental railroad is a network of railroad tracksTrackage OnLine Def that crosses a continental land mass. It must be continuous. It has terminals at different oceans or continental borders. Such networks can be via the tracks of either a single railroad, or over those owned or controlled by multiple railway companies along a continuous route. ==References== ==Other websites== * The Old Transandino * Trans-Asian Railway Project * Uniting the States of America Category:Trains
title: Transcontinental railroad
